message.body: HAPPY BIRTHDAAAAYYYYYYY I LOVE YOU. TIME TO GET CRUUUUUUNKKKKK
THAAAAANKS IM ALREADY CRUNK OFF OF THIS HOMEWORK IM DOING LOLOLOL
That's not a thing that happens lololol
Aw thanks. The UWS is like not a zone but we could lose water/electricity. The wind is so0o0o0o0 crazy
Yeah we never get hit too hard. The wind here is also pretty cray. It's definitely moving past us up towards you
Yeah. It's so crazy here. Like two days off? We don't get snow days with two days off like ever
I know that's pretty serious. Hopefully it will be just like Irene
The flooding is already worse than Irene
Omg yeah I'm looking at pictures of Brooklyn right now. Crazy!
Yeah. It's fucking insane. And everyone's like not leaving. Mad stoops
